The following lists provide links to the Dashboard Summary web pages developed by MCOE based for Level 2 support based on data from CDE.

```{r}
#| include: false


library(MCOE)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)



dash.mry.da.details <- read_rds("dash_mry_da_details.rds")

da.dists <- dash.mry.da.details %>% 
    select(cds) %>%
    unique() %>%
    unlist()



index.tbl <- tibble(cds = da.dists) %>%
    rowwise() %>%
    mutate(dist.name = mcoe_name(cds),
           url = paste0("<a href='","https://monterey-dashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","dashboard2023summary", cds, ".html","'>","https://monterey-dashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","dashboard2023summary", cds, ".html","</a>"  ) ) %>%
    select(-cds)

# atsi.cde.mry.michelle <- read_rds("atsi list michelle.rds")





```

::: panel-tabset
## DA Districts

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

datatable(index.tbl,
          colnames = c("District", "URL"),
          caption = "List of Districts in Differentiated Assistance (DA)",
          rownames = FALSE,
          options = list(lengthChange = FALSE,
                         searching = TRUE),
       escape = FALSE) 


```
